testcase.summary: Verify that importing JPEG photos works
testcase.description: 1. Import JPEG photo from File Import photo 2. Set all parameters in property window 3. Verify that the photo can be found from Photovault 4. Stop Photovault and start again 5. Verify that photo and all properties are the same as before
testcase.expectedresult: 1. Import status dialog is displayed 2. Property window is shown and disappears after pressing OK 3. Photo found 4. Photovault starts 5. Photo and its properties intact
